com.koalog.util.swing
Interface AutoApplication

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseApplication
public interface AutoApplication

An interface to access an application so that it can be partially automatically generated from an XML file.

Field Summary

Field Detail

KEY_AUTO_APP

public static final java.lang.String KEY_AUTO_APP
The key used to store the application on the actions. Every action instantiated by the application loader will have the application among its values, accessible by this key. It thus possible by such an action to access the application values by name, so that the data can easily be shared between the actions, and the actions are reusable in other applications (not final because of obfuscation).

See Also:

public Infos getInfos()
Gets infos about the application.

Returns:
an Infos object

setInfos

public void setInfos(Infos infos)
Sets infos about the application.

Parameters:
infos - an Infos object

getMainFrame

public javax.swing.JFrame getMainFrame()
Get the main frame of the application. The different application items can be accessed from there. For instance, the menu bar can be modified to add menus and menu items.

Returns:
The application main frame.

getActions

public java.util.Map getActions()
Get the application actions. Each action is uniquely identified by its name, used as its key in the returned Map instance.

Returns:
A name to action map.

getAction

public javax.swing.Action getAction(java.lang.String key)

getMenus

public java.util.Map getMenus()
Get the application menus. Each menu is uniquely identified by its name, used as its key in the returned Map instance.

Returns:
A name to menu map.

getValue

public java.lang.Object getValue(java.lang.String key)
Get a value from the application context.

Parameters:
key - The key used to store the value.
Returns:
The object corresponding to the key, or null if the object can not be found.

putValue

public void putValue(java.lang.String key,
                     java.lang.Object value)
Add a value to the application context.

Parameters:
key - The key used to store the value.
value - The object to add to the application context.

setTitle

public void setTitle(java.lang.String title)
Set the application title.

Parameters:
title - The key of the localized title.

setIcon

public void setIcon(java.lang.String icon)

getBundleName

public java.lang.String getBundleName()
Get the application resource bundle name.

setBundleName

public void setBundleName(java.lang.String bundle)
Set the application resource bundle name.

Parameters:
bundle - The name of the application resource bundle.

addBusyAction

public void addBusyAction()
Notify the application that it is busy. This method should be called by any action while it is doing something in the event thread.

removeBusyAction

public void removeBusyAction()
Notify the application that an action has finished its work.
